msg: Deploy registry service, make localhost the default

author: robj
msg: Fix bug found by Carl Woolf.

author: rubys
msg: 1) Deploying beans from deploy.xml now works
2) Type mappings for deployed services are serialized with the service
3) Hierarchical type mappings now use: msgContext, service, server, SOAP
4) MessageContext is once again serially reusable

author: rubys
msg: Add DOM2Writer from xml-soap.  It was nearly a drop-in replacement - the
only changes were to convert to Axis's NSStack and make the intial xml
This removes the dependency on Xalan.
